QueryResult.text: SELECT CMN_TIME_LABEL_FCT ( L.LANGUAGE_CODE, T.HIERARCHY_LEVEL, T.DAY_KEY, T.WEEK, T.WEEK_KEY, T.MONTH, T.QUARTER, T.YEAR ) TIME_LABEL, DECODE ( T.WEEK, NULL, NULL, CMN_TIME_LABEL_FCT ( L.LANGUAGE_CODE, 'WEEK', T.DAY_KEY, T.WEEK, T.WEEK_KEY, T.MONTH, T.QUARTER, T.YEAR ) ) WEEK_LABEL, DECODE ( T.MONTH, NULL, NULL, CMN_TIME_LABEL_FCT ( L.LANGUAGE_CODE, 'MONTH', T.DAY_KEY, T.WEEK, T.WEEK_KEY, T.MONTH, T.QUARTER, T.YEAR ) ) MONTH_LABEL, DECODE ( T.QUARTER, NULL, NULL, CMN_TIME_LABEL_FCT ( L.LANGUAGE_CODE, 'QUARTER', T.DAY_KEY, T.WEEK, T.WEEK_KEY, T.MONTH, T.QUARTER, T.YEAR ) ) QUARTER_LABEL, DECODE ( T.YEAR, NULL, NULL, CMN_TIME_LABEL_FCT ( L.LANGUAGE_CODE, 'YEAR', T.DAY_KEY, T.WEEK, T.WEEK_KEY, T.MONTH, T.QUARTER, T.YEAR ) ) YEAR_LABEL, L.LANGUAGE_CODE, T.TIME_KEY, T.DAY_KEY, T.DAY, T.WEEK_KEY, T.WEEK, T.MONTH_KEY, T.MONTH, T.QUARTER_KEY, T.QUARTER, T.YEAR_KEY, T.YEAR, T.PERIOD_START_DATE, T.PERIOD_END_DATE, T.HIERARCHY_LEVEL, T.CREATED_DATE, T.CREATED_BY, T.LAST_UPDATED_DATE, T.LAST_UPDATED_BY FROM CMN_LANGUAGES L, NBI_DIM_CALENDAR_TIME T ORDER BY DECODE (T.HIERARCHY_LEVEL, 'DAY', 1, 'WEEK', 2, 'MONTH', 3, 'QUARTER', 4, 5), TIME_KEY
